content.value:
🎅The Tech Nottingham Secret Santa Gift Exchange is go!

✉️Secret Santas - your giftee details are in your inbox!

📅You have until 17th December to pick a gift then send it to Tech Nottingham or drop it off at one of our drop-off locations

🎁 Let's spread some festive cheer🎄😊
